p: Some of the compounds present in our volatile oils were already tested for their anti-parasitic activities. Thus, the IC 50 of alpha-pinene (55.3μg/mL; 4.1μg/mL), sabinene (126.6μg/mL; 17.7μg/mL), β-pinene (200.1μg/mL; 54.8μg/mL), α-phellandrene (32.8μg/mL; 9.2μg/mL), 4-terpineol (335.9μg/mL; 0.02μg/mL) were reported against promastigotes of L. major and the bloodstream forms of T. brucei (TC 221), respectively [ 40].
